snippet.title: The Benza RPG Trailer (2020) iOS, Android, Steam
snippet.description:
Download Now!

iOS:  https://apps.apple.com/us/app/id1525113197
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1449370/The_Benza_RPG/

Tired of sharing the spotlight, Inko Sensei has kidnapped Lee and trapped the entire cast and crew of the hit Japanese comedy television series "The Benza" inside of a retro RPG! 

Battle through thirty floors of the Japanese School.  Visit the mysterious Shadow Circus. Challenge the battle arena.  Join Chris and Kyle on their latest adventure to stop Inko Sensei and save Higashi Nakano! 

Featuring more than ten playable characters and over 250 new lines recorded by the cast of "The Benza" and "Benza English"!

Coming soon to Android devices and Steam!

Starring
Kyle Card as Kyle
Christopher McCombs as Chris
Haku Inko as Inko Sensei
Michiko Noguchi as Za
Masahito Kawahata as Tamura
Hannah Grace as Stephanie
Hunter Alexander as David
Janni Olsson as Alena
Kaori Ikeda as Kaori
Aver Hamilton III as Hamilton
Maria Papadopoulou as Maria
Kosuke Imai as Kosuke
Stuart O as Mr. O
Shayna Magnuson as Shayna
Hiro Ono as Hiro
Shizuka Anderson as Carol
David Mashiko as Tomo
Justin Leeper as Justin
Bob Werley as Bob
and Lee Min Kuk as Lee

https://www.tokyo-cowboys.com/thebenzarpg

#thebenza #benzaenglish #retrorpg #amazonprimevideo
